assignment.title: Explore Kite IDE Integration
assignment.objective: To gain familiarity with setting up and using Kite for AI-assisted coding enhancements.
expectedCapabilities: Install Kite in a chosen IDE
Use Kite's features to enhance code quality and speed
assignment.submissionInstructions: Submit screenshots showcasing Kite's code suggestions and your completed code.

tasks.title: Write a Program Using Kite
tasks.description: Complete a simple task using Kite to aid in code completions and understand its benefits.

steps.title: Download and Install Kite
steps.description: Visit the Kite website, download the installer, and complete the installation process for your preferred code editor.

steps.title: Configure Kite for Your IDE
steps.description: Integrate Kite with your preferred IDE (e.g., VSCode) and ensure it is running smoothly.

steps.title: Write a Simple Program Using Kite
steps.description: Create a simple function in your chosen programming language. Use Kite to assist with variable declarations and function completion.
steps.codeExample:
def greet_user(name):
    return f'Hello, {name}!'

name = 'Alice'
greet_user(name)

checkForUnderstanding.question: What is the benefit of using Kite?
options: Enhancing code accuracy with minimal keystrokes
checkForUnderstanding.answer: Enhancing code accuracy with minimal keystrokes

subsections.title: Introduction to Kite
subsections.content: Kite is an AI-powered coding assistant that integrates with your code editor to help you write code faster. It uses machine learning models to recognize patterns in your code, predicting the next word youâ€™re going to type, and providing intelligent code completions for various languages.

quizzes.question: What is Kite primarily used for?

subsections.title: Installing Kite
subsections.content: Kite can be installed on various platforms and supports popular IDEs like Atom, VSCode, PyCharm, and Sublime Text. You can download the installer from the official Kite website and follow the installation guide for your specific editor.

quizzes.question: Which editors does Kite integrate with?

subsections.title: Using Kite for Code Completions
subsections.content: Once Kite is set up, it runs in the background and provides suggestions as you code. It can autocomplete entire lines or give suggestions for method names, variables, and more based on your coding history and context.
codeExamples:
def calculate_area(radius):
    pi = 3.14
    area = pi * (radius ** 2)
    return area

quizzes.question: How does Kite enhance coding productivity?

subsections.title: Kite Programming Features
subsections.content: Kite provides several features like function signatures, documentation pop-ups, and error notification to help improve your coding efficiency and understanding of the code. It also integrates learning resources for programming.

quizzes.question: What kind of additional learning resources does Kite provide?
